de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin
Class DicomRouterPlugin

java.lang.Object
  de.iftm.dcm4che.router.plugin.DicomRouterPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
DicomStorageSCUPlugin, ExportImagePlugin, InfoPlugin, NullPlugin, PortableMediaCreatorPlugin, PrivateRemovePlugin, PseudonymPlugin, SaveDicomdirPlugin, SaveFilesystemPlugin, TagModifyPlugin, UIDModifyPlugin, XSLTransformPlugin
public abstract class DicomRouterPlugin
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a DicomRouterPlugin. The abortion or closing of the plugins have to take place by calling methods close or abort. Before a DefaultDicomRouterPlugin can be closed the next plugin in the chain plugin has to be closed. A abort of a DefaultDicomRouterPlugin is only possible if the plugin is not closed.
